description: Now Boarding Intelligent Web3 An Exclusive Evening of Insights, Integration & Innovation Join Gate.com for a curated journey into the next era of digital value. This exclusive evening is designed to dissect the intelligent infrastructure powering the future, from the foundational mechanisms of stablecoins and tokenized assets to the transformative convergence of AI and Web3 applications. Together, we will navigate the pivotal integrations reshaping finance Our curated discussions will illuminate the bedrock of stablecoins, TradFi, and the revolutionary potential of AI agents in Web3. Highlights of the Night: 17:35 Keynote Speech - Gate Intelligent Web3 - Bringing Intelligence On-Chain 17:50 Panel Discussion AI Agents in Web3: What Works, What Breaks, and What Comes Next 18:10 Panel Discussion Stablecoins: The Infrastructure for the Real Web3 Economy Short Break Refreshments 19:15 Panel Discussion Going On-Chain: Repricing Trust, Liquidity and Ownership In TradFi 19:35 Fireside Chat A Blueprint for Brand Adoption in Web3 with Suntory Networking and Cocktail Buffet So, prepare to board. This evening is your portal to be fully immersed IN the ecosystem to gain critical INsight, witness powerful INtegration, and fuel the next wave of INnovation. We look forward to connecting with you in Hong Kong. Disclaimer The content herein does not constitute any offer, solicitation, or recommendation. You should always seek independent professional advice before making any investmen...
